Search results may be inaccurate or incomplete. For discrepancies between this website, and an actual posted street sign, then the street sign is always the one to follow. Please report such errors so that we may fix them.



Email address:

Reminder preference:

The No-Tow™ program reminds residents by email of street sweeping in their neighborhoods. To sign up, check off at least one street, enter your email address, submit, and follow instructions in the confirmation email. Email reminders for the next day's sweeping are sent daily. Come back to this webpage anytime to add/delete streets to your reminder list. Deliverability of reminders is not guaranteed.

Daytime Street Sweeping Ends Nov. 30th
During the winter months, street cleaning and parking restrictions are nighttime only. Forget which street alerts you're registered for? Enter email address for reminder of No-Tow alerts. Reminder Alerts
